# The `SectionDescriptor` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This structure is used to keep data of the concrete section. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This structure is used to keep data of the concrete section.

Like data bits, list of patches, format.

Definition at line 152 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-h">OutputSections.h</a>.

### notePatchWithOffsetUpdate() {#ada575452de07c297cfeea8ce744a79ed}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::parallel::SectionDescriptor::notePatchWithOffsetUpdate (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> T &amp; Patch, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/#ad2dde002b59709a633439269e84fb29c">OffsetsPtrVector</a> &amp; PatchesOffsetsList)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
While creating patches, offsets to attributes may be partially unknown(because size of abbreviation number is unknown).

In such case we remember patch itself and pointer to patch application offset to add size of abbreviation number later.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-h/#l00210">210</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-h">OutputSections.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setSizesForSectionCreatedByAsmPrinter() {#a0756e89d8eafc4bc2503dd3976765f61}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SectionDescriptor::setSizesForSectionCreatedByAsmPrinter ()">
Some sections are emitted using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a>.

In that case &quot;Contents&quot; member of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/sectiondescriptor">SectionDescriptor</a> contains elf file. This method searches for section data inside elf file and remember offset to it.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-h/#l00218">218</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-h">OutputSections.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-cpp/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-cpp">OutputSections.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Protected Member Functions

### applyIntVal() {#a404cacae16324605710710194e08e5ca}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SectionDescriptor::applyIntVal (uint64&#95;t PatchOffset, uint64&#95;t Val, unsigned Size)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Writes integer value <code>Val</code> of <code>Size</code> by specified <code>PatchOffset</code>.

### StartOffset {#af80b542f4b0c15d3425d97257ecda897}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::parallel::SectionDescriptor::StartOffset = 0</>}>
When objects(f.e.

compile units) are glued into the single file, the debug sections corresponding to the concrete object are assigned with offsets inside the whole file. This field keeps offset to the debug section, corresponding to this object.
